text:
Wojciech Zygmunt Pszoniak (2 May 1942 – 19 October 2020) was a Polish screen and stage actor. He was born in what is now the present-day Ukrainian city of Lviv. His movie credits include "The Devil" (1972), "The Promised Land" (1975), "The Tin Drum" (1979) and "Austeria" (1983).
Pszoniak died in Warsaw on 19 October 2020 from cancer. He was 78.
